Events.Text: Hello.. I am looking to get directions from Craig and Center to Broadway and Main
will you de driving?
Do you want to drive, walk, or use public transit?
I would prefer to drive
what will be the departure time?
When are you going to start your trip?
Oh never mind I would like to take transit, forgot I have to drop my car off. So would like to leave at 8am

DetailedTransitInstructions: Go to the bus stop at the corner of the intersection. The stop will be in front of a barbershop.
Take the 28X to Forbes and Atwood. You will travel 8 stops and it will take 15 minutes.
Walk in the same direction as the bus for 1 block. You will pass a school on your right.
Cross the street at the football field and immediately turn left.
Your destination will be on the right and you should see a McDonalds beside it.

Scenario.UserTask: You want directions from 'Craig and Center' to 'Broadway and Main' at 8 am by Transit. When the wizard gives the 1st and 4th step, indicate that you do not understand until you are given more detail. Keep going until you've reached your destination.
Scenario.WizardTask: Tell the user the directions from their departure location to their arrival location

UserQuestionnaire.Question: Did the AI Assistant give you suitable directions?
Did the AI Assistant stay calm and helpful throughout the dialogue?

WizardQuestionnaire.Question: Did the user change his/her mind about what he/she wants at any time?
Did the user become aggressive or annoyed during the dialogue? (Note: some users may be instructed to be annoying.)
Where you unsure about what to do at any time? (Feel free to send us an email with details.)
